(B) Particulars of Scouring: Gravel recruitment appears heavy in lower reaches, alterating the stream bed height, thus drying up in the summer.
(C) Water levels: Water levels very low in the lower reaches up to the spawning period; high water levels during spawning period.
(D) Spawning distribution: Most coho use the upper reaches for spawning.
(H) recommended enhancement: There is a local enhancement project for coho
(I) Habitat change: The heavy gravel recruitment to the lower reaches should be addressed - at present it is dredged by the city every 2 years.j
(K) Additional comments: Assigned to Enhancement Branch for enumeration but no data was supplied. The only salmon in this system are coho.
